titles: An out-cry of poets; or, a catalogue of wits to be sold by inch of can.dle [sic], or otherways The sale begining next Tuesday in the Piazza in Covent Garden, about nine of the clock in the morning, and will last till seven at night.
author: Ouldman, Thomas.
notes: Attributed to Thomas Ouldman by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
keywords: Poets, English --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
